Text

The quality of the air in [London]1-london in 1991 was quite average .

Even though [he]165-he had been in [this world]166-this world for almost a year , [Jon]44-jon was still not used to the slightly grey sky even in the summer season .

In [this world]166-this world , [his]44-jon identity is that of [an orphan who has been brought up in [an orphanage]169-an orphanage]168-an orphan who has been brought up in an orphanage .

But in fact , like thousands of fantasy stories , [Jon]44-jon , who on the surface looks like [an ordinary 11 - year - old boy]170-an ordinary 11 - year - old boy , has a soul from the 21st century .

In [his]44-jon previous life , [Jon]44-jon was [a newly hired employee who had just entered the workplace]171-a newly hired employee who had just entered the workplace .

One day on [his]44-jon way to work , [he]44-jon witnessed a motorbike accident in which [two young men about [his]44-jon age , who were riding [the bike]173-the bike together]172-two young men about his age , who were riding the bike together were hit , and tragically fell into [the river]174-the river by [the road]175-the road .

Instead of standing by and watching on the sidelines with indifference , [Jon]44-jon who had considered [himself]44-jon [a good swimmer]176-a good swimmer took off [his]44-jon jacket and jumped into the water to help .

[He]44-jon had just grabbed [a young man who had fallen into [the stream]178-the stream and was about to swim towards [the shore]179-the shore]177-a young man who had fallen into the stream and was about to swim towards the shore when unfortunately the water weed caught [his]44-jon ankle and caused [his]44-jon calf to cramp up when [he]44-jon struggled , and [he]44-jon ended up not only failing to save [the man]180-the man but also getting [himself]44-jon killed .

Luckily for [him]44-jon , [God]45-god has not closed [his]44-jon eyes completely , and by the time [Jon]44-jon , who had lost consciousness underwater , reopened [his]44-jon eyes , [he]44-jon was in [a British hospital]181-a british hospital as [a nine - year - old boy named [Jon Green]44-jon , who was abandoned by [[his]44-jon parents when [he]44-jon was born and later found and raised in [an orphanage]169-an orphanage]183-his parents when he was born and later found and raised in an orphanage]182-a nine - year - old boy named jon green , who was abandoned by his parents when he was born and later found and raised in an orphanage .

[The doctors]185-the doctors diagnosed that [he]44-jon had suffered a violent blow on the head , causing a concussion .

And [the Jon who woke up]186-the jon who woke up had not inherited any semblance of memory except the gift of speech that had become instinctive within [the original owner]187-the original owner 's body .

Luckily , a diagnosis like a concussion became the perfect excuse for [his]44-jon memory loss ; after all , the human brain was something that had n't been thoroughly researched even in the 21st century , let alone right now in the late 20th century .

After being brought back to [the orphanage]188-the orphanage from [the hospital]189-the hospital , [Jon]44-jon had basically figured out the situation of the body [he]44-jon had been reborn into .

[The original owner]187-the original owner had always been [a silent , withdrawn , timid and self - absorbed character in [the orphanage]188-the orphanage]191-a silent , withdrawn , timid and self - absorbed character in the orphanage , and [he]187-the original owner seemed quite unremarkable among all [the children]193-the children except for [his]187-the original owner outstanding looks , and because of all this , [he]187-the original owner had become [the lowest of [the bunch]195-the bunch]194-the lowest of the bunch .

During a spring outing , [some boys]196-some boys took the opportunity to force [the original owner]187-the original owner to the edge of [a dirt slope]198-a dirt slope .

Afterwards , [the original owner]187-the original owner hit the back of [his]187-the original owner head on a raised rock as [he]187-the original owner rolled down , which led [Jon]44-jon , who later crossed over ( transmigrated ) , to possess [the poor boy]200-the poor boy .

But according to [the children]193-the children , [Jon]44-jon was not forced by [them]193-the children to fall down , rather , as [they]193-the children were forcing [him]44-jon , [he]44-jon suddenly flew up , knocking everyone else around [him]44-jon , then fell from the sky and finally rolled down from the top of [the dirt slope]202-the dirt slope before hitting [the rock]203-the rock .

Of course , [the adults]204-the adults would not believe such an obvious lie , which only [a child]205-a child could make up , and [they]204-the adults just considered it as an excuse [the children]193-the children made up to get away with it .

But [Jon]44-jon , who had just crossed over and had already experienced an unscientific event , became suspicious of it .

But no matter what [he]44-jon tried to do , [he]44-jon was unable to detect anything special in [his]44-jon body , so [he]44-jon gave up the illusion that [he]44-jon had actually gained superpowers after crossing over .

After all , no matter how [he]44-jon looked at it , [he]44-jon had only crossed over from the year 2020 to 1991 and judging from both history and the current state of affairs , it looked completely identical to [[his]44-jon world]207-his world , only with a difference in the timeline .

After clearly understanding the situation , [Jon]44-jon , for whom the time - travel had become an established fact , took the mindset that [he]44-jon would just accept what [he]44-jon was given .

Although [he]44-jon was not [an orphan]208-an orphan in [his]44-jon previous life , [[his]44-jon parents]209-his parents divorced when [he]44-jon was very young , and [both of [them]209-his parents]210-both of them never bothered about [him]44-jon at all , other than giving birth to [him]44-jon . Later , [they]209-his parents both started [[their]209-his parents own new families]211-their own new families .

[[Jon]44-jon , who had been brought up by [[his]44-jon grandmother]213-his grandmother]212-jon , who had been brought up by his grandmother , also lost [her]213-his grandmother , [[his]44-jon only family]214-his only family , when [he]44-jon went to university , and since then [he]44-jon had lived on [his]44-jon own , without a care in [the world]215-the world .

Since [he]44-jon had nothing to worry about , [he]44-jon could live [his]44-jon life anywhere , not to mention the fact that [he]44-jon has the advantage of foresight brought by time - travelling back to the 20th century . So even in [unfamiliar England]18-england , [he]44-jon does n't think [he]44-jon will lead a bad life with such a good deck of cards in [his]44-jon hand .

However , as [a child]205-a child , it is not easy to go out and do certain things , so [Jon]44-jon can only stay in [the orphanage]188-the orphanage where [he]44-jon was raised for the time being .

Now of course [Jon]44-jon 's situation in [the orphanage]188-the orphanage is completely different from that of [the original owner]187-the original owner .

It 's not that [he]44-jon has done anything , but after the incident on the spring outing , [the other children]220-the other children all see [him]44-jon as [a freak]221-a freak through word of mouth , and the verbal and physical bullying has turned into cold violence .

[He]44-jon really liked this , and from whatever point of view , [he]44-jon did n't want to get involved with [a group of big kids who has a habit of bullying [9 - year - old]223-9 - year - old and would mostly end up causing more problems in [society]224-society]222-a group of big kids who has a habit of bullying 9 - year - old and would mostly end up causing more problems in society .

Sitting on [the yard swing]225-the yard swing , [Jon]44-jon was looking up at the bright green yew tree that towered in the middle of [the yard]226-the yard .

[A few children around [him]44-jon , who are all slightly older than [him]44-jon]227-a few children around him , who are all slightly older than him , looked at [him]44-jon with a peculiar look and then moved away from [him]44-jon as if [they]227-a few children around him , who are all slightly older than him were avoiding the plague .

[Jon]44-jon did n't notice [their]227-a few children around him , who are all slightly older than him expressions , as all [his]44-jon attention was drawn to one place at the moment .

At the entrance to [the orphanage]188-the orphanage , [Mrs Chris]46-mrs chris , who acted as [the matron]229-the matron , is leading [a young man]230-a young man in .

There was nothing peculiar about such an action ; although [this orphanage]231-this orphanage [he]44-jon is living in is small , every now and then , there will be [people from [London]1-london]232-people from london who would drop by to volunteer .

What really struck [Jon]44-jon as odd was [the young man]233-the young man 's clothes .

[He]233-the young man wore a long black robe with a snake crest embroidered on [his]233-the young man chest .

This did not look like modern clothing but rather resembled the illustrations of medieval wizards featured in [the orphanage]188-the orphanage folklore books that [Jon]44-jon had read through .

[The young man]233-the young man did not appear to be very old , probably under thirty .

[His]233-the young man complexion was pale as if [he]233-the young man had n't been exposed to the sun for years , [his]233-the young man yellowish hair was neatly groomed , and [he]233-the young man walked alongside [Mrs Chris]46-mrs chris with a light smile on [his]233-the young man face , looking like [a relatively easy person to get along with]236-a relatively easy person to get along with .

As if noticing [Jon]44-jon 's gaze , [the young man in the black robe]237-the young man in the black robe looked over at [him]44-jon .

As [they]238-they met , [Jon]44-jon looked into [his]233-the young man eyes and for some reason , [he]44-jon felt a bone - chilling coldness in them and shivered as [he]44-jon slightly averted [his]44-jon gaze .

And it was at that moment [Mrs Chris]46-mrs chris said something to [that man]239-that man , and together [they]238-they came closer to [Jon]44-jon .

" [Jon Green]44-jon ? "[233-the young man] [The young man]233-the young man asked gently .

[Jon]44-jon was obviously a little taken aback by the situation , and with this gesture , [the other man]241-the other man seemed to have come specifically to see [him]44-jon .

" Yes , [sir]2526-sir . "[241-the other man]

Hearing [Jon]44-jon 's words , [the young man]233-the young man did not introduce [himself]233-the young man , but turned [his]233-the young man head to [Mrs Chris]46-mrs chris and said .

" [I]233-the young man need to talk to [this boy]2527-this boy alone . "[233-the young man]

Surprisingly , [Mrs Chris]46-mrs chris , in contrast to [her]46-mrs chris usual mean and sarcastic nature , did not hesitate or ask any more questions in the face of [the young man]233-the young man 's tone of voice that was unmistakably an order , and simply turned around to give [them]238-they privacy .

The expression on [Jon]44-jon 's face did not change , but in [his]44-jon heart , [he]44-jon had a vague feeling that something is not quite right .

Just as [he]44-jon was feeling uneasy , a yellowed parchment and a feather quill flew out of [the youth]244-the youth 's pocket , defying common sense , and hovered in front of [Jon]44-jon 's body !

" Congratulations , [Mr Jon Green]44-jon , because of [your]44-jon unique talent , [Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry]2528-hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry has opened its doors to [you]44-jon . Just by simply signing this letter of acceptance , [you]44-jon will become [a soon - to - be Junior Wizard]2529-a soon - to - be junior wizard . "[233-the young man]

" [Hog]47-hog , [Hogwarts]61-hogwarts ? "[233-the young man]

After hearing the words of [the young man]233-the young man in front of [him]44-jon , [Jon]44-jon 's face showed complete shock .

The parchment that floated in front of [him]44-jon contained a bolded English title " Notice of acceptance to [Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry]2528-hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry "[233-the young man] at the top .

The letter of acceptance is too long , but apart from the title , the text below is written in a language that [Jon]44-jon has never seen before , and at the bottom of the letter , there is a school crest .

It is not the crest with four animals , a lion , eagle , badger and snake , surrounding an H , as [he]44-jon recalls it .

Rather , it consisted of a dark green , tongue - spitting snake coiled around an H.

[Jon]44-jon had certainly seen the Harry Potter books and films in [his]44-jon previous life , and only a week before [he]44-jon crossed over , [he]44-jon had rewatched the first four films and remembered this whole magical story very well .

What [he]44-jon had never anticipated was that [the world [he]44-jon had arrived in]246-the world he had arrived in is actually [the Wizarding World of [Harry Potter]48-harry potter]4-the wizarding world of harry potter !

The parchment that is currently floating in front of [him]44-jon , and the quill that approached [his]44-jon hand as if it could n't wait for [him]44-jon to hold it , is definitely not a magic trick .

At such a close distance , [Jon]44-jon is certain that the parchment and the quill are not manipulated by any transparent threads or any other blindfold tricks , but are just floating in the air in front of [him]44-jon !

The way [the young man]233-the young man is dressed , the era [he]233-the young man is in , the name of [Hogwarts]49-this hogwarts and the magic on display all ascertain [Jon]44-jon that [he]44-jon has indeed arrived in [the world of [Harry Potter]48-harry potter]248-the world of harry potter !

But not only [he]44-jon did n't feel any excitement , but [he]44-jon was getting calmer and calmer , and the feeling that something was n't right just kept building up in [his]44-jon heart .

Why did the Hogwarts crest no longer match the one [he]44-jon remembered ?

Why this method of recruiting [new students]249-new students for admission is so different from the one in the original ?

Why this acceptance letter is written in a language [he]44-jon could not understand , should n't this be in English ?

Who is [this young man in black robes that is recruiting [him]233-the young man]250-this young man in black robes that is recruiting him ? Which one of [the Hogwarts professors]251-the hogwarts professors is [he]233-the young man ?

The first two questions [he]44-jon simply could not ask at this time , and just as [Jon]44-jon hesitantly thought of asking the name of [the young man]233-the young man , [the other man]241-the other man had spoken before [him]44-jon .

" [I]241-the other man inquired about [your]44-jon life here , [Mr Green]44-jon . "[241-the other man]

[His]44-jon voice sounded very gentle , and [he]44-jon seemed to have enough patience to explain to [Jon]44-jon about this school of magic .

" A year or so ago , something happened to [you]44-jon that the muggles around [you]44-jon had no way to understand ; it is a sign that the gift of magic has manifested itself in [you]44-jon , and [these people at the orphanage]2531-these people at the orphanage had no way of accepting the existence of magic , which is why [they]2531-these people at the orphanage rejected [you]44-jon like this . "[44-jon]

" But in [Hogwarts]61-hogwarts , it is very different , it is where all [your]44-jon kind is , [you]44-jon have the same kind of origin as [them]2531-these people at the orphanage , along with the same abilities , [you]44-jon do n't have to suffer the same exclusion as [you]44-jon do [here]2532-here , and [the professors at [the school]2534-the school]2533-the professors at the school will teach [you]44-jon magic exclusively . "[44-jon]

" There will be a welcome dinner for [you]44-jon when [you]44-jon enter [the school]2534-the school , there will be [a warm common room]2536-a warm common room , a variety of food that will vary from day to day , [the professors]2537-the professors will be kind , [the students]2538-the students will be friendly , [Hogwarts Castle]5-hogwarts castle is the best place for [you]44-jon to belong . "[44-jon]

[The young man]233-the young man 's words were unhurried , but [Jon]44-jon always felt [he]233-the young man seemed hurried , so hurried that [he]233-the young man had forgotten to even introduce [himself]233-the young man .

" [Sir]2526-sir , [you-]233-the young man "[233-the young man]

" Just sign [your]44-jon name on this notice , [Mr Green]44-jon . Or do [you]44-jon have any doubts about what [I]233-the young man 've said ? "[233-the young man] [He]233-the young man asked with a smile .

It is easy to gain the trust of [a young child with that smile]255-a young child with that smile , but [his]233-the young man eyes did n't match the smile at all . There is an extremely deep hidden coldness and boredom that [Jon]44-jon caught keenly at the very beginning of [their]256-their meeting .

Precisely this contrast made [Jon]44-jon feel alienated to the core .

" No , [I]233-the young man have no doubts [sir]2526-sir , it 's just that [you]2526-sir ... "[233-the young man]

" Since [you]44-jon have no doubts , sign the acceptance notice , [we]256-their have other things to do next , like getting [you]44-jon a wand and buying a [school uniform]2541-school uniform or something . "[233-the young man]

Again [he]233-the young man interrupted [Jon]44-jon 's question with a smile on [his]233-the young man face , urging [him]44-jon to sign the notice .

The quill had squeezed hard in [Jon]44-jon 's hand , and [he]44-jon raised it , pulled up by the quill in [his]44-jon hand to place it on top of the piece of parchment , but refused to sign as [he]44-jon still wanted to know just who [this young man in front of [him]44-jon who had come to recruit [him]44-jon for admission really is]257-this young man in front of him who had come to recruit him for admission really is , and the true situation .

" [Sir]2526-sir , [you]2526-sir have n't made a self ... "[244-the youth]

" Sign ! "[244-the youth]

[The youth]244-the youth interrupted [his]233-the young man question with a sudden shout as if [he]244-the youth could no longer bear it !

And just at the same time , a dazzling red light suddenly shot out from behind [the young man]233-the young man , spanning a distance of more than ten metres in the blink of an eye , and struck [him]233-the young man in the back !

A transparent light shield , which seemed to be tainted by the red light , lit up around [the young man]233-the young man , successfully counteracting the spell , but at the same time , the shield itself began to break apart !

The gentle smile on [the youth]244-the youth 's face faded , and [his]244-the youth expression turned cold and loathsome .

[He]244-the youth pulled [his]244-the youth small wooden stick - like wand from [his]244-the youth left sleeve and without hesitation , launched a counterattack in the direction the red light had come from .

" Stupefy ! "[244-the youth]

An identical red light shot out from the tip of [his]244-the youth wand , but the spell did n't hit [its]262-its target , instead , it hit the grass in front of [the sneak attacker]263-the sneak attacker , stirring up a large patch of dirt .

Magic in [this world]166-this world is undoubtedly a power largely centred around the mind , and the key to spellcasting is [the wielder]928-the wielder [himself]928-the wielder , and things like incantations , wands and wand - wielding gestures would all be considered aids .

The absence of these things would not mean that [a wizard]2578-a wizard would lose the ability to use magic , but it would certainly increase the difficulty of learning and mastering a particular spell by making it more chaotic .

The reason why incantations , wands and wand - wielding gestures were created was to enable [wizards]2730-wizards to master specific spells in a more precise and orderly manner .

While the basics can be mastered with practice and skill , belief and magic power can not be strengthened just by diligence .

[He]44-jon froze slightly , then lifted [his]44-jon hand and saw a ring that had never been there before on [his]44-jon index finger !

It was a silver ring , slim in overall appearance , fitting on [Jon]44-jon 's finger precisely in the right size , and a diamond - shaped blue gemstone embedded in the middle of the ring .

The gem is small and is not held above the ring , it 's just enclosed in the ring , and around the side and back of the gem , around the silver ring , there are still four diamond - shaped gaps faintly visible , exactly like the one in front , like four other gems supposed to be embedded there .

[Jon]44-jon could n't help but frown deeply at the ring , [he]44-jon is certain it is not [his]44-jon ring , and [he]44-jon has never seen this ring before !

[He]44-jon tried to remove the ring from [his]44-jon index finger and took it off easily .

[Jon]44-jon 's first thought was that it belonged to [Slughorn]99-slughorn , because [he]44-jon had n't had it in [his]44-jon hand before [he]44-jon entered [the office]558-the office , and it had suddenly appeared right after [he]44-jon had left the door of [the office]558-the office .

With a brief reflection , [he]44-jon figured out what to do with it .

Whether or not it had slipped into [his]44-jon hands from [[Slughorn]99-slughorn 's office]1078-slughorn 's office , [he]44-jon would have to go back and give [him]99-slughorn the ring .

In the magical world , diaries , rings , lockets , jewellery pieces and the like , especially those of unknown origin , tended to be bad things , with curses beyond normal human comprehension attached to them .

[Jon]44-jon had no illusions that this ring might contain [an old grandfather who might proclaim [him]44-jon to be [the Chosen One]1096-the chosen one]1095-an old grandfather who might proclaim him to be the chosen one , and it was safer to nip any possible danger in the bud than let it slip away !

" Come in . "[44-jon]

" [Professor]2639-professor , this ... "[99-slughorn]

" [I]80-neville went to do [Professor Slughorn]99-slughorn a little favour , do n't worry , [I]80-neville 've already eaten lunch and brought back some dessert . "[80-neville]

Curls of white steam rose from the cauldron .

[Lily]50-lily carefully tilted a vial containing dark green liquid and put three drops into the cauldron , and instantly the potion in the cauldron turned from purple to grass green .

And just as [she]50-lily placed the vial down , there was a sudden soft knock at the door .

" Come in . "[50-lily]

[Slughorn]99-slughorn walked in carrying a box of crystallized pineapple , and [Lily]50-lily looked up at [him]99-slughorn with a noticeably softer expression on [her]50-lily face .

" Okay , okay , do n't start teaching [me]50-lily , without this [my]50-lily life would become at least 50 % less enjoyable . ' [Her]3106-her intention in leaving this sentence in the book was so that [beginners to magic]3107-beginners to magic could clearly distinguish the difference between charms and transfiguration , and it could , equally , explain the utility of magic itself . "[99-slughorn]

" Change , that is the ultimate objective for which all magic is created . " But there is a unified rule to all such changes , [Jon]44-jon , and perhaps [you]44-jon have been exposed to magic for a too short period of time to have discovered this rule - [the wizard]363-the wizard uses magic out of [himself]363-the wizard , but all that magic can change is [the world]215-the world , but not [the wizard]363-the wizard [himself]363-the wizard . "[99-slughorn]

"[99-slughorn]

"[99-slughorn]

" [You]44-jon 're not wrong with that example , [Animagus]127-animagus , a high - end transfiguration spell , is indeed [an ancient wizard]3115-an ancient wizard 's attempt to change [himself]3115-an ancient wizard with magic , but it 's actually a product of a failed attempt . "[99-slughorn]

" Are [you]44-jon ready ? "[99-slughorn] [Slughorn]99-slughorn asked .

" Ready , [teacher]3143-teacher . "[99-slughorn]

[He]99-slughorn pointed the tip of [his]99-slughorn wand at [[Jon]44-jon 's temple]1336-jon 's temple , and then the next instant , some kind of silk thread had attached itself to the tip of the wand , [Slughorn]99-slughorn twirled [his]99-slughorn wand and pulled a bright silver thread out of [Jon]44-jon 's mind !

The sensation [Jon]44-jon felt now was strange , [he]44-jon could clearly perceive a force pulling [his]44-jon memories away from [him]44-jon , it was not a good experience and [his]44-jon body instinctively resisted the act .

Although [his]44-jon body did not move , the feeling of resistance in [his]44-jon mind was very strong , it was like [some robber]1337-some robber had snatched something from [your]44-jon hands right in front of [your]44-jon eyes , and [your]44-jon first reaction to it would be to get [your]44-jon stuff back .

At the same time that [Jon]44-jon had this reaction , the silver thread that had been pulled out of [his]44-jon head was suddenly halted as if it had taken root in [his]44-jon head , and the movement became difficult and slow .

But in the end , the wand still pulled the silver thread out in one whole piece .

[Slughorn]99-slughorn stored the piece of memory [he]99-slughorn had extracted from [Jon]44-jon 's mind into the Pensieve , and [he]99-slughorn smiled at [Jon]44-jon who was a little lost in thought at the moment as if [he]44-jon was recalling the feeling [he]44-jon had just felt .

" Did [you]44-jon not like that feeling and instinctively wanted to resist it ? "[99-slughorn]

[Jon]44-jon nodded as [he]44-jon frowned .

" [My]44-jon mind wants to disrupt that sensation uncontrollably and ... It 's almost as if it was acting on its own ? "[44-jon]

" Not as if . "[99-slughorn] [Slughorn]99-slughorn said approvingly , " [Your]44-jon body 's instinct to defend itself was very strong , it made a spontaneous resistance of its own volition indeed , and that resistance had some effect . "[99-slughorn]

" That 's a very good start , [Jon]44-jon , the Occlumency was created in the beginning after [someone]1060-someone registered the feeling of constantly having [their]1060-someone memories forcibly read , which reinforced [their]1060-someone natural instincts and eventually evolved into magic . [Some people]2901-some people are naturally not exactly sensitive to this act of reading memories , and [such people]3185-such people would have an exceptionally difficult time learning Occlumency , and [you]44-jon clearly fall into the opposite category . "[99-slughorn]

[Slughorn]99-slughorn showed [his]99-slughorn delight .

" This is a perfectly good thing , and it shows that [we]3186-we would probably make good progress after this . "[99-slughorn] With that , [he]99-slughorn looked at the bright silver , mist - like mass of memories in [the Pensieve]131-the pensieve and asked [Jon]44-jon , " Is this memory something that can be viewed by [others]3187-others ? "[99-slughorn]

[Jon]44-jon , of course , had no reason to refuse , and [he]44-jon entered into the memory that had been extracted from [his]44-jon own mind with [Slughorn]99-slughorn .

[ [Nicolas Flamel]137-nicolas flamel 's First Death Anniversary , [Philosopher]1414-philosopher 's stone still Missing ]

It was also at this time that [Christmas]140-christmas arrived .

In normal circumstances , Christmas is a break between the first and second semesters of the school year in [the UK]1363-the uk , and after the Christmas holidays , the second half of the school year will officially begin .

But for [Hogwarts]61-hogwarts which is in exile , [the students]2538-the students do n't even have a summer holiday , and naturally , [the students]2538-the students are not allowed to go [home]2726-home at Christmas .

Even [those pureblood students who still have [[their]1526-those pureblood students who still have their families , such as ron and neville families]1527-their families , such as [Ron]79-ron and [Neville]80-neville]1526-those pureblood students who still have their families , such as ron and neville , must also have to spend Christmas at [school]2628-school , but after Christmas is over , there will be no classes at [school]2628-school for two weeks , and [they]1526-those pureblood students who still have their families , such as ron and neville can go [home]2726-home and reunite with [[their]1526-those pureblood students who still have their families , such as ron and neville loved ones]1531-their loved ones for a few days at that time .

[He]80-neville looked at the flower planted in a pot in the gift box , revealing a fascinated look .

[Neville]80-neville loved the Herbology class so much that [he]80-neville became obsessed with some magical plants . [Slughorn]99-slughorn said seriously : " [Wizards]2730-wizards require a very high level of ' will ' to cast spells on [their]2730-wizards own , even if [you]44-jon meet the conditions to learn this way of casting spells , it does not mean that [you]44-jon can cast any magic without care . "[99-slughorn]

In this regard , [Jon]44-jon certainly has no objection , [he]44-jon so far can only use a total of four spells proficiently , Levitation Charm , Wand - Lighting Charm , Repairing Charm and Dancing Feet Spell .

The first three spells were learned in the Charms Class , the Dancing Feet Spell - [Tarantallegra]148-tarantallegra was self - taught after school hours when [he]44-jon fumbled on this spell in [the library]2945-the library .

Apart from the Levitation Charm , [Jon]44-jon could not think of what effect the other three spells would have if they worked directly on [him]44-jon .

Will Wand - Lighting Charm would turn [him]44-jon into [a glowing man who glows brightly all the time]1900-a glowing man who glows brightly all the time ? Would the Mending Charm ( repairing charm ) mend [his]44-jon mutilated body when [he]44-jon got injured ? Or would the Dancing Feet Spell enable [him]44-jon to dance superbly ?

Except for the middle one , which sounded a bit reliable , what would be the lethality of the other two spells if they really worked like that , besides making [[his]44-jon enemies]1901-his enemies die laughing when [he]44-jon uses [them]1901-his enemies ?

From all these options the levitation charm is the only spell that seems practical for now .

This charm can make objects float and fly by reducing weight , the more proficient [the user]1902-the user is in casting the charm , the more heavy objects [they]1902-the user can propel .

If this charm can be used on [the wizard]363-the wizard [themselves]363-the wizard , then [they]363-the wizard can have the ability to fly without any external force , no ?

When [he]44-jon thought of this [Jon]44-jon 's eyes could not help but become excited , but [Slughorn]99-slughorn who clearly discerned [his]44-jon thoughts at this time , splashed a pot of cold water on [him]44-jon before [he]44-jon could daydream .

" Do not treat this so simply , the ring can only help [you]44-jon change the way [you]44-jon cast spells , it can not change the power of [your]44-jon magic spell , if [your]44-jon levitation charm itself is not mastered in depth , then [you]44-jon will not be able to accomplish what [you]44-jon anticipated . "[99-slughorn]

But [Jon]44-jon was not discouraged by what [he]44-jon said , the opportunity is now before [him]44-jon , and what kind of proficiency [he]44-jon can achieve later on will only depend on [himself]44-jon .

" First , cast the levitation charm once , let [me]44-jon see how well [you]44-jon have learned this spell . "[44-jon]

After hearing [Slughorn]99-slughorn 's words , [Jon]44-jon pointed [his]44-jon wand at a book on the desk in front of [him]44-jon and proceeded to recite the incantation .

" Wingardium Leviosa . "[44-jon]

In the next second , the book was elevated as if lifted by an inexplicable force and rose abruptly into the air . Then [Jon]44-jon controlled it to move around .

[Slughorn]99-slughorn was satisfied with the effect of [Jon]44-jon 's levitation charm .

" Very good , even in the fourth year , [you]44-jon ca n't find [a student who can use and control levitation charm]3431-a student who can use and control levitation charm to [your]44-jon level . "[99-slughorn]

[Jon]44-jon looked at [Slughorn]99-slughorn with an expectant gaze .

" Then is this level enough ? "[44-jon]

" Put the ring on [your]44-jon body , whether it 's around [your]44-jon neck or on [your]44-jon hand , then try it out . "[99-slughorn]

" No need to wield the wand , just recite the incantation as usual , but in [your]44-jon head think of making [yourself]44-jon fly instead of some kind of object , which is only a target replacement , [you]44-jon should be able to do it . "[44-jon]

[Jon]44-jon asked with some incredulity .

" Is it that simple ? "[99-slughorn]

" Simple ? "[99-slughorn] [Slughorn]99-slughorn smiled , " Just try it once before [you]44-jon ask . "[99-slughorn]

[Jon]44-jon wore the ring around [his]44-jon neck again , and [he]44-jon resisted the urge to pick up [his]44-jon wand and wave it , which is a habit [he]44-jon has developed , after a few seconds , [he]44-jon just simply recited the incantation .

" Wingardium Leviosa . "[44-jon]

[He]44-jon could clearly feel the magic power in [his]44-jon body being mobilized , but that power was extremely minuscule , much weaker than when casting spells with a wand .

Unlike any other previous spells [he]44-jon had used , where [his]44-jon magic power would flow through [his]44-jon wand to affect the real world , it flowed directly to the ring [he]44-jon wore around [his]44-jon neck , and then quickly returned to [his]44-jon body .

At that moment , [Jon]44-jon felt as if [he]44-jon was a little different from a second ago , but on the surface , [he]44-jon had n't changed at all .

" Do [you]44-jon feel anything ? "[99-slughorn] [Slughorn]99-slughorn inquired .

[Jon]44-jon did not immediately answer , instead , [he]44-jon hesitantly raised [his]44-jon arm , then jumped in place a few times , before saying hesitantly .

" [I]44-jon have a feeling that [my]44-jon body seems to have become a little lighter ? But the change is too minimal to quite feel the difference between before and after . "[44-jon]

The smile on [Slughorn]99-slughorn 's face froze , [he]99-slughorn restrained [his]99-slughorn expression and looked at [Jon]44-jon with a serious face from head to toe .

" Are [you]44-jon sure [you]44-jon sensed it accurately ? "[99-slughorn]

[Jon]44-jon could not give an accurate answer because there was no way to know whether that subtle change was real or just a misconception on [his]44-jon part .

But [Slughorn]99-slughorn apparently had the means to determine the change in [his]99-slughorn body at the moment , [he]99-slughorn nudged [his]99-slughorn wand on [Jon]44-jon 's shoulders and arms and felt the magic power that had been blended into [his]44-jon limbs , which was quite different from normal , and a look of amazement appeared on [his]99-slughorn face .

" It 's subtle , not easy to notice , but there is indeed a change , it 's incredible , [Jon]44-jon , it 's really incredible ! "[99-slughorn]

[Jon]44-jon had some difficulty understanding [his]99-slughorn behaviour .

" What 's wrong with that ? [Professor]2639-professor . "[44-jon]

[Slughorn]99-slughorn snapped out of that moment of lapse of concentration , and [he]99-slughorn seriously explained to [Jon]44-jon .

" [I]99-slughorn once explained to [you]44-jon , for any magic , magic power and ' will ' are the fundamentals , the incantation and wand are only auxiliary , but if there is no auxiliary , then even if the necessary conditions are met , casting spells will become extremely difficult . [You]44-jon should have been taught by [Filius]100-flitwick in the class in which [you]44-jon learned the levitation charm about the mistake of [a wizard who once summoned [a cow]3434-a cow because [he]3433-a wizard who once summoned a cow because he mispronounced a syllable of the levitation charm mispronounced a syllable of the levitation charm]3433-a wizard who once summoned a cow because he mispronounced a syllable of the levitation charm , and this is just a typical example . "[99-slughorn]

" [You]44-jon are now changing the way [you]44-jon cast spells , it would be equivalent to overturning the magic spell system with the wand , although the magic spell itself still would not change , the previous incantation of the levitation charm will not be applicable to [you]44-jon ; normally speaking , if [you]44-jon use the same set of incantation pronunciation as wand casting system , it should not have produced any effect at all . Magic change on [yourself]44-jon will not be the same as [the outside world]2893-the outside world change , because of syllable errors the effect of the entire spell will be changed . The incantation to cast the spell on [yourself]44-jon will need to be altered , the usual incantation should n't have an effect on [you]44-jon . "[44-jon]

[Jon]44-jon understood [Slughorn]99-slughorn 's point , [he]44-jon recited the incantation in accordance with the way of wand casting was simply wrong , even though the wrong pronunciation of incantations when casting spells on [ourselves]1904-ourselves would not result in levitation charm turning into summoning cow magic , but it also would not produce any effect at all .

But now [his]99-slughorn otherwise wrong incantation happened to be effective , although the effect was very minimal , from nothing to something is a very big leap .

" Then why did this happen ? "[44-jon] [Jon]44-jon asked , a little puzzled .

" The auxiliary means was wrong , but the magic that should have failed succeeded , then the reason for that could only be magic power and ' will ' . "[99-slughorn] [Slughorn]99-slughorn looked at [him]44-jon seriously , " [Your]1905-you magic power is normal , no different from [other 11 - year - olds]3436-other 11 - year - olds , so the only explanation would be the strong ' will ' fuelling the success of the magic . "[99-slughorn]

' Will ' is something that [you]1905-you can not specifically measure .

In the wizarding world , to cast any spell , ' will ' or what [you]1905-you might call intent and emotion is necessary , and it is considered to be as significant as magic power in the process of casting a spell .

Just like the 3 D 's of Apparition Charm -- Destination ( target ) , Determination ( resolve ) , and Deliberation ( unhurried ) , all of these are actually the manifestation of will ( intent ) .

The biggest difference between [people]376-people is the gap in [their]376-people mentalities . [People who think that [they]1907-people who think that they can accomplish something absolutely have very different levels of determination than others can accomplish something absolutely have very different levels of determination than [others]3187-others]1907-people who think that they can accomplish something absolutely have very different levels of determination than others .

In magic , this is reflected in a very straightforward way .

For example , in the case of the same spell , the strength of the ' will ' would determine the power of that spell if the magic power , pronunciation and precision of wielding the wand are identical to one another .

Of course , other factors will also produce a difference , but it absolutely wo n't be as obvious to [everyone]587-everyone as [Will]125-bill ( intent ) .

Just as it was mentioned in the original story , [the real dark wizards with dark hearts]1910-the real dark wizards with dark hearts will never be able to learn the Patronus Charm , because there is no way for [them]1910-the real dark wizards with dark hearts to structure any good intention that is enough to cast that spell in [their]1910-the real dark wizards with dark hearts minds , so even if all other factors are present , [they]1910-the real dark wizards with dark hearts will not be able to learn this spell because of [their]1910-the real dark wizards with dark hearts mentality .

According to [Slughorn]99-slughorn , [Jon]44-jon 's ' will ' is far stronger than that of [a normal wizard]1709-a normal wizard .

This is the reason why [he]44-jon could forcibly use the levitation charm that was supposed to fail .

But even if such a weak effect can be produced , it is simply useless , and the next thing [Jon]44-jon needs to do is to keep trying to find the right way to pronounce the incantation .

Because there is no previous precedent , there are no already countless times attempted the most accurate pronunciation for [him]44-jon to learn directly .

In this regard , even [Slughorn]99-slughorn can not help [him]44-jon , [Jon]44-jon can only rely on [himself]44-jon little by little with the exhaustive method to figure out .

The workload is actually not small , although it is just a single spell , the levitation charm has a total of eight notes , according to the short and long sound , there are nearly thousands of different combinations of high and low pitches , but if [he]44-jon devotes the rest of the week or so of holiday in it , [he]44-jon can basically get a rough pronunciation of incantation .

But before [he]44-jon officially began , [he]44-jon first went to [[Professor McGonagall]71-professor mcgonagall 's office]1535-professor mcgonagall 's office and asked [the Transfiguration professor]1913-the transfiguration professor a favour to transfigure up a weight scale for [him]44-jon .

Because [his]44-jon powerful ' will ' assisted [him]44-jon to make even the wrong incantation work , [he]44-jon needed a more precise comparison to find out the difference .

In the following two days , [Jon]44-jon was completely cooped up in [[his]44-jon dorm room]1102-his dorm room , [he]44-jon prepared a large stack of parchment and started by changing the syllables of the first note of the spell , constantly changing the tone , the sound length , and then getting on the scale to observe the changes produced in [his]44-jon body .

Most mispronunciations of the incantations produced a barely detectable change , but [you]1915-you can detect it by the value visually reflected on the scale , which showed that [Jon]44-jon 's weight was 500 grams to 1000 grams lighter than before the spell was cast .

This effect is certainly very unsatisfactory , will not provide [him]44-jon with even a little help , let alone make [him]44-jon fly in the air as [he]44-jon had previously expected it would , under the influence of the levitation charm .

This attempt went on until [Neville]80-neville and [Ron]79-ron returned to [the wagon]433-the wagon at the end of the holiday .

When [Neville]80-neville returned to [[his]80-neville dorm room]1102-his dorm room , [he]80-neville noticed that [Jon]44-jon had been chanting the incorrect levitation charm incantation over and over again all day , and then getting on the scale to measure [his]44-jon weight like [a madman]1918-a madman .

" What 's wrong with [you]44-jon ? Were n't [you]44-jon the first of [us]3437-us to learn the levitation charm ? Why can not [you]44-jon even recite the incantation now ? And even if it 's just a practice , [you]44-jon should be holding a wand , no ? "[1918-a madman]

[Neville]80-neville looked at [Jon]44-jon worriedly , with a face full of doubt that [he]44-jon was under some kind of evil spell .

" Two kilograms , this is the most weight loss so far , but it is certainly still not much . "[44-jon] Staring at the scale on the weight scale , [Jon]44-jon shook [his]44-jon head in disappointment and once again marked one of the pronounced combinations on the parchment with a wrong symbol , and then added the reduced weight .

" But can [you]44-jon really succeed in such an attempt ? "[80-neville] [Neville]80-neville could n't help but say , " Do n't [you]44-jon remember what [Professor Flitwick]98-professor flitwick said when [we]3439-we started to learn the levitation charm , this charm ca n't possibly affect [the wizard]363-the wizard due to the resistance from magic in [our]3439-we body , otherwise , there would be no such thing as a flying broom . "[80-neville]

" [I]44-jon 'll give it a try . "[44-jon]

"[44-jon]

Just as [his]44-jon words trailed off , [Jon]44-jon had pronounced the Incantation of the spell with unparalleled clarity .

" wing -- gar -- dee -- um -- leh -- vee -- oh -- sa ! "[44-jon]

The moment the incantation was pronounced , [Jon]44-jon perceived something special this time .

Magic had never been so visibly mobilized as when [he]44-jon was casting spells with [his]44-jon wand normally !

Without the wand as an outlet , the magic power moved from [his]44-jon body to the ring and then once again returned to [his]44-jon body after a transit .

" [You]80-neville 're not faking it , right ? "[80-neville]

[Jon]44-jon 's face showed an incomparable look of excitement , [he]44-jon did not speak and directly answered [Neville]80-neville with actual actions . With one hand propped up on the desk , [he]44-jon jumped upward with all [his]44-jon strength from [his]44-jon original spot .

" Boom ! "[44-jon]

In the next second , [his]44-jon head hit the three - meter - high ceiling of [the wagon]433-the wagon solidly .

[Neville]80-neville did not know how [a normal 11 - year - old boy]1921-a normal 11 - year - old boy jumped this high .

" How did [you]44-jon do that ? "[44-jon]

[Jon]44-jon clearly misjudged the buff effect of the levitation charm on [his]44-jon body , after it took effect , [he]44-jon could feel [his]44-jon body roughly about half of [his]44-jon previous weight , originally [he]44-jon thought that even if [he]44-jon jumped up harder , it was impossible to jump to a height of three meters , but three meters are obviously not enough .

What this implies , [Jon]44-jon [himself]44-jon knows very well .

[His]44-jon height is about one and a half meters , and the ceiling of [the wagon]433-the wagon is over three meters and twenty centimetres , which means the height [he]44-jon has just taken off [the ground]1929-the ground is more than one and a half meters .

And the world record for the standing high jump was only one meter eighty - three in [his]44-jon previous life !

If there is no ceiling to confine ; when [his]44-jon body develops and grows ; if [he]44-jon usually exercises more , [Jon]44-jon is confident enough to jump more than double this height .

A single leap from the ground to reach more than three meters high has far exceeded the natural limits of human physiology .

And [he]44-jon could clearly feel that the benefits brought to [him]44-jon by the levitation charm certainly not only reflected in the standing high jump above , as long as [he]44-jon became more familiar with this feeling now , [he]44-jon certainly would also be able to run faster and become more responsive in [his]44-jon movements .

In the wizarding world where the majority of magic used in a battle focused on firing skills , possessing such dexterity that surpasses that of [ordinary people]1715-ordinary people is similar to using a cheat code when playing online games- ' Modding ' .

[Jon]44-jon , who was incredibly happy , did n't forget to answer [Neville]80-neville 's question .

" Just like what [you]80-neville saw earlier , reciting the incantation , and then a jump . "[44-jon]

" How the hell did [you]80-neville do that ? "[80-neville]

After two failed attempts , [Neville]80-neville once again looked at [Jon]44-jon with incredulity .

" [I]44-jon told [you]80-neville before , [Professor Slughorn]99-slughorn taught [me]44-jon something quite different , something that has a high learning threshold , it 's not that [I]44-jon do n't want to tell [you]80-neville [Neville]80-neville , but [I]44-jon promised [[my]44-jon teacher]3441-my teacher that [I]44-jon wo n't tell [anyone]633-anyone about this . "[44-jon]

[Neville]80-neville could understand [Jon]44-jon 's statement , [the Longbottom family]2751-the longbottom family is [an ancient wizard family with a historical heritage]1932-an ancient wizard family with a historical heritage , and [he]80-neville knew that although [wizards]2730-wizards are mostly taught about magic in [the academy]1934-the academy , some spells are still passed on privately between [master]1296-master and [disciple]1936-disciple or [father]336-father and [son]409-son .

At the same time without [Jon]44-jon asking [him]80-neville , [he]80-neville took the initiative to say that [he]80-neville would keep this matter a secret and would not talk about it to [anyone]633-anyone .

The great physical change did not stop [Jon]44-jon from checking [his]44-jon weight on the scale . When [he]44-jon measured [his]44-jon weight this time , [he]44-jon was half as weight , as usual , roughly 16 kg .

"[44-jon]

" What was [your]44-jon initial expectation ? "[44-jon]

For the next three days , [Jon]44-jon never left [[his]44-jon dorm room]1102-his dorm room except for eating , constantly trying various syllable combinations of levitation charm pronunciation , but [he]44-jon did not find another syllable combination that could surpass the one from before so far .

Just when [he]44-jon was about to continue [his]44-jon stay in [[his]44-jon room]3026-his room until the end of the Christmas holidays , [Ron]79-ron , [Justin]77-justin and [the gang]567-the gang eagerly knocked on [[Jon]44-jon 's dormitory]1947-jon 's dormitory door .

" [We]3443-we are here because [you]44-jon have been in [[your]44-jon dorm room]3444-your dorm room for almost two weeks now , and [we]3443-we have something important to tell [you]44-jon , [Jon]44-jon ! It 's a matter of life and death for [Hogwarts]61-hogwarts ! "[79-ron]

[Ron]79-ron 's face was grave , and [his]79-ron tone was very serious as if [he]79-ron wanted to attract the attention of [Jon]44-jon , who was ticking on a piece of parchment filled with incantations .

When [Jon]44-jon heard [his]79-ron alarming words , the movement of the quill in [his]44-jon hand obviously paused for a bit , then [he]44-jon stared at [Ron]79-ron , without pressing [him]79-ron to ask what kind of big issue would actually be so serious , and said .

" What [Professor Flitwick]98-professor flitwick taught [us]3621-we in class , firm and unwavering belief that the target that the wand is aimed at can float , and then chant the incantation while swinging the wand . "[80-neville]

" Knowing what 's going to happen without knowing what 's happening has always been a characteristic exhibited by magic . "[44-jon] [Jon]44-jon 's voice was calm , yet [one]295-one could tell [he]44-jon was unusually emotional , " Just like when turning matches into needles , [[our]3621-we professors]3622-our professors wo n't bother to teach [us]3621-we exactly how the molecular structure of an object changes within the object as it transforms from wood to metal . "[44-jon]

" Same thing with the levitation charm ! "[80-neville]

" Magic intervenes with the rules and laws of [the world]215-the world , [the wizard]363-the wizard initiates the concept of change , and the way to make that change happen is determined by the magic itself ! "[44-jon]

" But what if [we]3621-we actively choose to specify how the magic intervenes with the rules when [we]3621-we cast the spell ? "[80-neville]

[Neville]80-neville absolutely had no idea what [Jon]44-jon was talking about , but [his]80-neville mouth dropped open , and although [he]80-neville did n't understand , [he]80-neville could sense that [this roommate of [his]80-neville]2032-this roommate of his is clearly thinking of something incredible right now !

"[44-jon]

The ultimate dream of [mankind]2250-mankind has always been conquering the sky .

Nevertheless , in all these long centuries of well - kept records in [the magical world]2566-the magical world , it was only [Voldemort]55-voldemort who did it first .

[Slughorn]99-slughorn had not learned the way of spell casting through the ring , but [he]99-slughorn had read all those magic materials left behind by [[his]99-slughorn old friend]2263-his old friend .

The ring casting only changed the target of the magic spell , and definitely did not provide any enhanced effect on the spell itself .

With that being said , [he]99-slughorn always believed that [Jon]44-jon might really be able to make [himself]44-jon fly in the future purely by relying on the levitation charm , but [he]99-slughorn thought that this process would take very , very long , maybe twenty , thirty or even fifty years , it 's definitely not right now .

But the scene unfolded in front of [him]44-jon was not in any way fake , [Jon]44-jon just flew in front of [him]44-jon , using the very ring [he]44-jon gave [him]44-jon , reciting a perfectly normal levitation charm !

The ceiling of [the storage room]2923-the storage room should be much higher than the one in [the dormitory]855-the dormitory , close to six meters high , [Jon]44-jon floating in mid - air can completely control [his]44-jon altitude and direction freely .

[He]99-slughorn actually simply replaced the core of the levitation charm with another equivalent one , turning the simple core intent to float up into a gravitational force control to fly up .

Nothing else has changed , so the normal control method of the levitation charm has not changed either .

But [Jon]44-jon is very , very aware of the biggest flaw this magic currently has , the fact , that it ca n't last too long .

Even if [he]44-jon has spent the past few months practising the " levitation charm "[99-slughorn] proficiently enough , the effect can now be maintained steadily for no more than a minute .

[Slughorn]99-slughorn has recovered from the shock , [he]99-slughorn raised the wand in [his]99-slughorn hand , and the vipers that covered the ground began to crawl towards the wall , after touching the wall they turned into an ever - growing vine and began to spread in the direction of [Jon]44-jon using the wall as a root .

" [You]44-jon 've really surprised [me]99-slughorn enough today , [Jon]44-jon . "[99-slughorn] Even though [their]2266-their wands are now facing each other , [the fat walrus]1323-the fat walrus still has not minced [his]1323-the fat walrus words of praise for [Jon]44-jon , " How long has it been , less than half a year , less than half a year since [you]44-jon actually started to learn this way of casting spells , and [you]44-jon have already accomplished the most perfect mastery of one magic spell . "[1323-the fat walrus]

" But even if [you]44-jon perform shockingly well , and [you]44-jon can truly fly with this spell , will it make any difference to the outcome ? "[1323-the fat walrus]

[Jon]44-jon 's gaze still remained fixed on the crack in [Slughorn]99-slughorn 's shield charm , the palm of [his]44-jon hand that held [his]44-jon wand tightly was sweating , and there were already rapidly spreading vines breaking into the space within twenty centimetres around [him]44-jon .

" As for the second question [you]56-dumbledore asked , [Jon]44-jon ; is [he]331-the dark lord really invincible or not , as [a loser]3934-a loser , [I]56-dumbledore ca n't give [you]44-jon a definite answer , but what [I]56-dumbledore can tell [you]44-jon is that even if [he]331-the dark lord had defeated [me]56-dumbledore once , [he]331-the dark lord ca n't guarantee that [he]331-the dark lord can still beat [me]56-dumbledore the second and third time like the first time , even if the wand in [my]56-dumbledore hand can no longer exert its full power . [Jon]44-jon fell silent .
